casebody.data:
Serenity FRIESON, by and through her Guardian Ad Litem, William Lewis King, and Shonta Daniels, Plaintiffs,
v.
Mavis K. TURPIN, Executrix of the Estate of Harold R. Turpin, d/b/a Crestview Childcare Center, Defendant. No. COA15-1094. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 21, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

No Error.
